quotes.content:
Someday, won't this be long ago?
I wanna feel that now
quotes.author: AJR

quotes.content:
I've been a "yes" man
'Cause I don't wanna know myself
I wish you the best, man
Now I got no more wishes left
quotes.author: Weezer, AJR

quotes.content:
If I don't believe in
All the old gods or the new
How am I supposed to find my way?
quotes.author: Fox Stevenson

quotes.content:
I'm an object in motion
Don't ask where I'm going
'Cause where I am going
Is right where I am
quotes.author: AJR

quotes.content:
Is the world that you're in okay?
Or does it need a hero who never wore a cape
To come and save the day?
quotes.author: Grabbitz

quotes.content:
Take it to the bank
Cut each and every string
And then to make sure
I'd put a trigger warning on you
quotes.author: Crypto, CARLIE

quotes.content:
The past hurts, but I have learned from it
And I say that while ignoring the future
quotes.author: Joost

quotes.content:
Nothing breaks like a promise
From somebody you trust
Were you being dishonest?
Or did you just say too much?
quotes.author: Vicetone

quotes.content:
Spilled my coffee, ripped my pants
Missed the bus, I had no chance
I'll try again tomorrow
Every day, it goes the same
Feels like I can't catch a break
quotes.author: Codeko, Becca Krueger

quotes.content:
You can't wake up, this is not a dream
You're part of a machine, you are not a human being
With your face all made up, living on a screen
Low on self-esteem, so you run on gasoline
quotes.author: Valence

quotes.content:
Something in the moonlight
Of the shadows in my head
Give into the silence
Of emotions that I dread
quotes.author: Unlike Pluto

quotes.content:
Wish I could look the other way
Wish that I had a half a brain
Wish I was numb to all this pain
quotes.author: Unlike Pluto

quotes.content:
Won't you help me sober up?
Growing up, it made me numb
And I wanna feel something again
quotes.author: AJR

quotes.content:
I'm so bad to me, bad to myself
'Cause I wouldn't take this shit
From anyone else
quotes.author: Hybrid Minds

quotes.content:
You know I'm hoping
All your dreams come true
But I hope you have a
Couple little nightmares too
quotes.author: Trixxie

quotes.content:
You got the worst of me
But I want the best for you
quotes.author: Trixxie

quotes.content:
Raindrops and mountain tops
Couldn't stop us sinking in bad decisions
God sent, he came and went
Now we're out here on our own
quotes.author: Paper Idol
